info.title: FlowMart API
info.description: FlowMart API is a RESTful API designed to help SMEs manage their stock efficiently. It allows users to create accounts, manage product categories, and add and view products by category. The API is built using the Laravel framework and is secured with session-based API keys.

get.summary: Retrieve all product categories for the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of all product categories created by the authenticated user.

post.description: Allows authenticated users to create a new product category by providing a unique name.

message.example: The name has already been taken.

put.description: Allows authenticated users to update the name of their existing product category by providing the category ID and a new name.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to update

message.example: Forbidden. You do not have permission to update this category.

delete.description: Allows authenticated users to delete their existing product category by providing the category ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

message.example: Forbidden. You do not have permission to delete this category.

get.summary: Retrieve all products for the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of all products across all categories owned by the authenticated user.

post.summary: Create a new product under a specific category
post.description: Allows authenticated users to create a new product within a specified category by providing the category ID, product name, and quantity.

message.example: You do not have permission to add products to this category.

get.summary: Retrieve all products under a specific category
get.description: Returns a list of all products within the specified category for the authenticated user.

message.example: You do not have permission to view products in this category.

put.description: Allows authenticated users to update the details of an existing product by providing its ID and the new data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to update

message.example: Forbidden. You do not have permission to update this product.

delete.description: Allows authenticated users to delete an existing product by providing its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to delete

message.example: Forbidden. You do not have permission to delete this product.

post.description: Allows new users to create an account by providing name, email, phone, and password.

message.example: The email has already been taken.

post.description: Authenticates a user using email and password and returns an API token.

get.description: Returns the profile details of the authenticated user.

put.description: Allows authenticated users to update their profile information, including name, email, phone, and password.

message.example: The email has already been taken.
Forbidden. You do not have permission to update this user.

delete.description: Allows authenticated users to delete their account.

message.example: Forbidden. You do not have permission to delete this user.

category_id.description: ID of the category under which the product is to be added
ID of the new category the product should belong to

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user was created

BearerAuth.description: Enter your Bearer token in the format **Bearer <token>**
